generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a dashed center line, extending into the distance.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, with pedestrians and a bus stop visible on the right.
- building: A multi-story brick building is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the road and are visible in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a white van and a dark-colored car.
- truck: A white truck is visible in the distance on the left side of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging over the road at an intersection.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a round sign with a red border and a white background, and a rectangular sign with a black border and white background.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
